name: Sync with Original and Modify on: schedule: - cron: '0 0 * * *' # Runs every day at midnight (adjust as needed) workflow_dispatch: jobs: sync: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: # Step 1: Check out the code from your forked repository - name: Check out forked repository uses: actions/checkout@v2 with: ref: main - name: Set up original repository as upstream and hard reset run: | git remote add upstream https://github.com/NaimurDev/hello-html.git git fetch upstream git checkout main git reset --hard upstream/main - name: Replace text in files run: | find . -type f -exec sed -i 's/NaimurDev/MySmartHomes/g' {} \; # Commit and push changes back to the fork - name: Commit and push changes run: | git add . git commit -m "Sync and replace NaimurDev with MySmartHomes" git push origin main
